name: Jill Balcon
summary: Jill Balcon. Actress: An Ideal Husband. Jill Balcon was born on 3 January 1925 in Westminster, London, England, UK. She was an actress, known for An Ideal Husband (1999), Esther Waters (1977) and The Life and Adventures of Nicholas Nickleby (1947). She was previously married to Cecil Day-Lewis. She died on 18 July 2009 in London, England, UK.
